content.p1:
This is a platform for Full Stack projects using Next.js. 
It provides an effective structure for the development of web applications with modern technologies. 
Key technologies are:
content.p2: Whether you create your first application or manage complex projects, this platform offers the tools necessary to start quickly with a minimum configuration

messages.nameMax: The name must have a maximum of 50 characters

messages.usernameRegexSpecialChars: The username can only contain letters, numbers, underlines (_) or dashes (-), and cannot start or end with special characters
